Keywords: Amazon , Justice League , Kryptonian , Metropolis , Reporter , Trinity
Real Name: Kal-El
Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Captain
MOVEMENT: This character can move through Blocking terrain. Immediately after movement resolves, destroy all Blocking terrain moved through.
PICK ON SOMEONE YOUR OWN SIZE: FREE: Choose a friendly Sidekick. That character can use Invulnerability until the end of your next turn.
KRYPTONIAN SKIN AND KRYPTONIAN SENSES: Impervious, Super Senses. Protected: Outwit.

Comments
February 10, 2022
muel0017
For 25pts less I always go with Rebirth Superman. While this one isn't bad by any means, it is a little boring.
July 30, 2021
Geof-Force
10 years ago, this would have been one of the greatest Superman pieces. Today, he's still good. That top dial with Impervious, Super Senses, and Protected: Outwit is golden if you can keep him there. With the WW TA, he'll be frustrating to take down, making that short dial look longer than it does, especially with Perplex no longer capable of boosting damage. That said, in the current Meta of ridiculously cheap powerhouses, he's a little overpriced for what he brings to the table.
June 24, 2021
Goop
For the same points i'd rather go with the fast forces JLU Superman. He has better stats and an extra attack. This piece is all about him hitting the 50/50 Super Senses. If you are hot with your rolls you are gonna love this guy, if not you will wish you played something else.
March 11, 2021
Cyke82
I think this may be one of the best Superman figures in this point range. Nothing fancy, but I like what we're getting here. The WW team ability means he has a 50% chance of evading a hit on top dial, and even if he fails, he has an Impervious roll to reduce damage to 0. If your dice are hot, he could be tough to take down. And with the change to CCE, he still packs a nice punch later in the dial.
March 7, 2021
DarkTortoise23
Even at this starting line, I'd be tempted to play this superman over the JLU common. I'm really liking the power in this dial.
